CustomField.description:
Local Tax Management: -Complete local tax filing in a timely and accurate manner
Corporate Tax Management: -Review tax computation prepared by Tax Agent and ensure timely and accurate submission -Follow-up with tax authorities for queries/clarifications (if any)
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Local Tax Management: -Complete local tax filing in a timely and accurate manner
Corporate Tax Management: -Review tax computation prepared by Tax Agent and ensure timely and accurate submission -Follow-up with tax authorities for queries/clarifications (if any)
CustomField.label: Tax Management: (e.g. GST, VAT, etc.)
